about.title: About me
about.desc: I am a Computer Engineer graduated from the Polytechnic University of Valencia in Spain, with more than 3 years of experience in the field. I love learning new things and acquiring new skills every day. In my free time, I enjoy reading, going to the gym, and trail running.
about.bookDesc: The Truth About the Harry Quebert Affair

learning.title: Now Learning...
learning.desc: Currently I am focused on the following subjects:

item1.desc: Fullstack developer using PHP for backend MySQL database and React and jQuery for the frontend.

item2.desc: Software developer, I used C++ and Python for programming scanners that detects fruit and vegetables defects.

item3.desc: Frontend developer, using Angular with Typescript for develop a modern web application for a bank.

item4.desc: Frontend developer using React with TypeScript and testing with Jest. Creating a NFT Marketplace for DC COMIC in the Palm Blockchain. Working with a team in different time zones and with meetings in English.

item2.title: TFG
